## Version 0.1.0 (2025-01-18)

### ðŸŽ‰ Initial Release

First public release of PyTennisScorer!

#### Features
- Complete tennis match scoring system
- Support for 6 different match formats:
  - Singles Grand Slam
  - Singles ATP Tour
  - Singles ATP Finals
  - Doubles Davis Cup
  - Doubles ATP Tour
  - Doubles Grand Slam
- Undo functionality for score corrections
- Standard tennis notation output
- Pure Python implementation with no dependencies
- Comprehensive test coverage (98%)
- Type hints throughout the codebase

#### Match Formats
- Configurable best-of-3 or best-of-5 sets
- Deciding point (no deuce) option
- Regular tiebreaks at 6-6
- Match tiebreaks for final sets (doubles)
- Special finals set rules

#### API
- Simple `TennisScorer` class
- `increase_score()` method for point scoring
- `undo()` for reverting last point
- `get_score()` for formatted score output
- `get_winner()` to check match status

#### Documentation
- Interactive documentation with Quarto-live
- Browser-based code execution via Pyodide
- Comprehensive tutorial
- API reference with examples
- Match type comparison guide
